body: @Wandering_weeb you are a good man thank you

I know no one cares about this but on the second chapter where they talk about the girlfriend the glasses friend says "I've dated her for three days"... that's wrong. In the raw he said " Karini tsukittemo mikka to motanna" which means "If i'm the one who's dating her, i wouldn't even last for three days" 

Again, i know no one cares but it's just bothering me. So yeah, please ignore this and go on with your lives.
